Error.Message: SQLSTATE[42S22]: Column not found: 1054 Unknown column 'RentVehicleRequestBrandName' in 'order clause'

Argument.SQL:
SELECT			V.*, 
				CONCAT(V.VehicleLicenseNumber, '') AS VehicleLookupCaption,TypeName, 
				'' AS _Other

FROM			vrs_vehicle AS V
	LEFT JOIN vrs_type As  TY ON  TY.TypeID = V.TypeID
	
	/*LEFT JOIN		X AS Y ON Y.YID = V.YID*/

WHERE VehicleIsActive = 1 
ORDER BY RentVehicleRequestBrandName ASC 
LIMIT 0, 200
